entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this morning then light late this afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 this evening. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Sunday 2 April 2023
